languages.text: "Дак один из моих. Не такой идиот, как остальные бездельники. В системах управления понимает, показания считывает. А ему — рецидивист!"

traits.locale_text: "Дак один из моих. Не такой идиот, как остальные бездельники. В системах управления понимает, показания считывает, как будто сам за штурвалом стоял. А ему — рецидивист!"

languages.text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"
languages.original_text: "Дак один из моих. Не такой идиот, как остальные бездельники. В системах управления понимает, показания считывает. А ему — рецидивист!"

traits.locale_text: "Dak. One of mine. Not an idiot like the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"
"Dak. One of mine. Not an idiot like the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"
"Dak. One of mine. Not an idiot like the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"
"He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"
"He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

languages.text: 「彼は私の部下です。ほかの怠け者どもほどバカじゃありません。制御システムを理解していて、計器の読み取りもできます。そんな彼が…再犯者ですって？」
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼は私の部下です。ほかの怠け者どもほどバカじゃありません。制御システムを理解していて、計器の読み取りもできます。そんな彼が…再犯者ですって？」

languages.text: "Adamlarımdan biri. Diğer aylaklar kadar ahmak değildir. Kontrol sistemlerinden iyi anlıyor ve okumaları anlamlandırabiliyor. Nasıl azılı bir suçlu olabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: "Benimkilerden biri. Diğer aylaklar kadar ahmak değildir. Kontrol sistemlerinden iyi anlıyor ve okumaları anlamlandırabiliyor. Nasıl azılı bir suçlu olabilir ki?"

languages.text: «Es uno de los míos. Menos idiota que el resto de esos haraganes. Entiende los sistemas de control y puede interpretar sus lecturas. ¿Y dice que es reincidente?».
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: «Es uno de los míos. Menos idiota que el resto de esos haraganes. Entiende los sistemas de control y puede interpretar sus lecturas. ¿Y dice que es reincidente?».

languages.text: “是我手下的船员，比其他混吃等死的家伙脑子灵活点。他很了解控制系统，也能理解那些读数的意思。就他，还惯犯？”
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: “是我手下的船员，比其他混吃等死的家伙脑子灵活点。他很了解控制系统，也能理解那些读数的意思。就他，还惯犯？”

languages.text: « Il s'agit de l'un de mes hommes. Et parmi ses tire-au-flanc de collègues, il fait figure d'exception. Il comprend les systèmes de contrôle et sait en interpréter les données. Je ne crois pas une seule seconde que ce soit un criminel endurci. »
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de l'un de mes hommes. Et parmi ses tire-au-flanc de collègues, il fait figure d'exception. Il comprend les systèmes de contrôle et sait en interpréter les données. Je ne crois pas une seule seconde que ce soit un criminel endurci. »

languages.text: "Er ist einer meiner Leute. Hat viel mehr Grips, als der Rest der Bande. Er versteht die Kontrollsysteme und kann die Anzeigen ablesen. Ausgerechnet er ... ein Wiederholungstäter?"
languages.original_text: "He's one of mine. Not as big of an idiot as the rest of the idlers. He understands the control systems, he can make sense of the readouts. Him — a repeat offender?"

traits.locale_text: "Er ist einer meiner Leute. Hat viel mehr Grips, als der Rest der Bande. Er versteht die Kontrollsysteme und kann die Anzeigen ablesen. Ausgerechnet er ... ein Wiederholungstäter?"
